experience.title: Backend Developer
details: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Python and Django REST Framework for a client-facing application.
Optimized database queries in PostgreSQL, resulting in a 15% improvement in API response times.
integration of OAuth2 authentication and Email integration for OTP
Wrote unit tests to ensure code quality and collaborated with the team using Git
